label: Demand Response Load Control
description: Allows requests to be made to appliances to temporarily reduce their energy usage to reduce demand on the power grid

drlcStatus.label: drlc status
drlcStatus.description: The status of the current or last active DRLC request

overrideDrlcAction.description: Override the requested load reduction request

requestDrlcAction.description: Request an appliance to reduce its load to aleviate power grid demmand

duration.description: The length of time load reduction should take place, in minutes

reportingPeriod.description: Optional reporting period in minutes. If specified the device will generate a drlcStatus event periodically while load reduction is in effect. If not specified then events will only be generated when the DRLC status changes.

start.description: The date & time at which load reduction is requested to start

drlcType.description: Type of load reduction request. One of the following:
